section.p: You come to the top of a windswept cliff. An ancient pillar of jumbled rock, pitted and weatherbeaten, stands at the cliff’s edge, like a broken finger pointing at the sky. Seagulls sing their song of desolation in the air.
Judging by the runes etched into the rock, the tor dates back to the time of the Shadar, a race that ruled Harkuna so long ago, they are lost in myth and legend.

choices.choice: Take the road to Marlock City
